body:
This represents the official release of Apicurio Studio, version 0.2.16.Final.

The following issues have been resolved in this release:

* [#469](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/469) Left bar is not showing correctly
* [#468](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/468) Editor: Create a filterable drop-down control
* [#467](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/pull/467) Apicurio studio 466
* [#466](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/466) GitLab connector does not fetch all groups/projects/branches
* [#463](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/463) Authentication fails: https://studio-auth.apicur.io:443: Connection reset
* [#458](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/458) Editor: Additional Fields in Definition (Enum, Examples, Minimum, Maximum, Default)
* [#446](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/pull/446) Fixes Syndesis Issue 3497: Apicurio GUI - info box not showed properly
* [#445](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/445) API Details: Tags should use PF labels
* [#444](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/444) Editor: Clearing out a field value should "null" it out properly
* [#443](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/443) Editor: Source view should update when document changes (unless dirty)
* [#439](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/439) Editor: Request Body always open in POST/PUT methods, overlaps with other elements
* [#438](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/438) Editor: feature request: generate examples based on the datatype definition
* [#437](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/437) Editor: show the provided example for the Data Types
* [#435](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/435) Editor: Show error when user tries to create a param with a duplicate name
* [#432](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/432) API Collaborators UI - Deleting a collaborator does not work
* [#431](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/431) Editor: Data type not de-selected after being deleted
* [#430](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/430) Editor: Display and edit description for Data Types (schema definitions)
* [#429](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/429) Editor: Allow editing/display of Path Item summaries & descriptions
* [#422](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/422) Editor: Box for entering / editing description is missing in path info
* [#416](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/416) Editor: Distorted UI when switching from GET to PUT of a path
* [#413](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/413) Editor: In Definitions "formatted as" cannot be set to string
* [#412](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/412) Editor: Update operation parameter UI if another user changes something in the path item
* [#406](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/406) Deleting a path and then re-creating it with the same path name (e.g. /) breaks the model
* [#333](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/333) How to tag an api operation?
* [#326](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/326) UX: Add a "counter" to all sections that list N items (tags, servers, etc)
* [#315](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/315) API Editor: Allow rename path
* [#266](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/266) Having funny UI behavior when using Grammarly extension in the browser 
* [#261](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/261) API Editor: auto-detect JSON only checks for {
* [#224](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/224) Back-End: Increase `description` field size limit in JDBC layer
* [#220](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/220) API Editor: Refactor names (Definitions, Responses, etc)
* [#169](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/169) Dashboard: Recent APIs should come from server
* [#139](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/139) Editor: Source disappears when not valid OpenAPI markup
* [#127](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/127) the current oauth security template for swagger is missing a parameter
* [#119](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/119) API Editor: edit @produces and @consumes per Operation
* [#117](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/117) API Editor: Edit tags for an Operation
* [#112](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/112) Explore Auth0 for authentication
* [#105](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/105) API Editor: auto-expand inline text editor as the user types
* [#21](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/21) Add Travis CI with nightly snapshot releases


For more information, please see the Apicurio Studio's official project site:

* [General Information](http://www.apicur.io/)
* [Download/Quickstart](http://www.apicur.io/download)
* [Blog](http://www.apicur.io/blog)
name: Beta 2.16
